pkgmetadata.longdescription: Interface to the 'USGS' 'BISON' 'API' // Interface to the 'USGS' 'BISON' 'API', a 'database' for species occurrence data on the web. Data comes from species in the United States from participating data providers. You can get data via 'taxonomic' and location based queries. A simple function is provided to help visualize data.
